text: Paul Ronty (July 12, 1928 â€“ April 22, 2020) was a Canadian professional ice hockey centre. Ronty started his National Hockey League career with the Boston Bruins in 1947. He also played for the New York Rangers and Montreal Canadiens. He retired after the 1955 season. He was born in Toronto. Ronty died on April 22, 2020 in Newton, Massachusetts at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Ice hockey people from Toronto Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:New York Rangers players
title: Paul Ronty
